tswitem.name: Inspiring Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Inspiring Augment Resonator
An unattuned support augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will give your team a beneficial effect that increases damage dealt by 1%/ 2%/ 3%/ 4%/ 5% for 5 seconds when you activate this ability. This can only happen every 30 seconds.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 2 Attuned Curing Augment Resonators
  • 30 Pure trinity runes
  • 30 Pure wheel runes
